text.text_translated:
In the 1990s, there was still graffiti. But street art grew very quickly. It became very popular all over the world.

Some artists wanted to make political points. Their art made people think about big problems. These problems were war, or when life is not fair for everyone. Other artists were different. They just wanted to make beautiful art. They wanted their work to look nice.

In South America, many artists worked in poor places. The city walls there were grey. The artists added colour and life to the walls. They made the walls beautiful.
